short_summary: Project Leader/Executive, Project Management Services for National Defense
description: The contract is for one (1) Senior Project Leader/Executive to support Director Aerospace Equipment Business (DAEBM) 7 and its Sustainment Centre of Expertise Air (CoE Air) activities.    The contract is for 230 days per year for two (2) years, plus three (3) irrevocable option years, allowing Canada to extend the term of the Contract.
